conversations.content: What was the date of Imam Khamenei’s speech delivered during a meeting with the members of the organizers of the International Congress of Martyrs of Resistance and Defenders of the Shrine?
Imam Khamenei’s speech was delivered on June 19, 2024.
When was the full text of Imam Khamenei’s speech published?
The full text of Imam Khamenei’s speech was published on June 29, 2024.
Where was the full text of Imam Khamenei’s speech published?
The full text of Imam Khamenei’s speech was published at the congress venue located in the holy shrine of Imam Reza (pbuh).
Who did Imam Khamenei pay tribute to in his speech?
Imam Khamenei paid tribute to the Martyrs Defending the Shrines and the Martyrs of the Resistance Front, especially the martyred general, Qasem Soleimani.
What did Imam Khamenei consider the defense of the shrines as?
Imam Khamenei considered the defense of the shrines as a symbolic aspect of defending the beliefs and aspirations of the shrine owners and the Ahl al-Bayt (pbut).
What are the high ideals of the School of the Ahl al-Bayt (pbut) according to Imam Khamenei?
The high ideals of the School of the Ahl al-Bayt (pbut) include justice, freedom, fighting against oppressive powers, and making sacrifices on the path of the truth.
Who did Imam Khamenei mention as an example of pure consciences throughout the world?
Imam Khamenei mentioned the solidarity shown by students at American universities with the people of Gaza as an example of the existence of pure consciences throughout the world.
What is important about the message of defending the shrines according to Imam Khamenei?
What is important is that the message of defending the shrines, which is in fact defense of humanity’s ideals, is conveyed to the pure consciences around the world.
What did Imam Khamenei identify as another dimension of defending the shrines?
Imam Khamenei identified another dimension of defending the shrines by emphasizing the global outlook of the Islamic Revolution.
What happens to any movement or revolution that only pays attention to its own internal environment and neglects foreign developments?
Any movement, any action, and any revolution that only pays attention to its own internal environment and neglects foreign developments will certainly suffer a blow.
What did Imam Khamenei recognize as a manifestation of the global outlook of the Islamic Revolution?
Imam Khamenei recognized the Defenders of the Shrines’ presence in countries where the enemy had devised a highly dangerous plot as a manifestation of the global outlook of the Islamic Revolution.
What plot did the enemy devise according to Imam Khamenei?
The enemy devised a plot and intended to destroy the Islamic system by dominating the region and simultaneously exerting economic and political, ideological and religious pressures on Iran.
Who neutralized the plot of the Arrogant Powers?
A group of faithful young people, with the Islamic Republic at its core, neutralized the plot of the Arrogant Powers.
What was the goal of organizations like Daesh and groups aligned with it?
The goal of these organizations was to destabilize the region, especially Iran.
Who neutralized the significant threat posed by Daesh and groups aligned with it?
The Defenders of the Shrine neutralized the significant threat posed by Daesh and groups aligned with it.
What did Imam Khamenei consider as another aspect of the Defenders of the Shrine movement?
Imam Khamenei considered the Islamic Revolution's ability to recreate its inherent fervor and enthusiasm from the early days of victory as another aspect of the Defenders of the Shrine movement.
What did certain individuals with Western ideologies predict about the Islamic Revolution?
Certain individuals with Western ideologies predicted that the Islamic Revolution and its principles and ideals are weakening.
What did Imam Khamenei describe as an incredible and unparalleled phenomenon?

Imam Khamenei described the courage, selflessness, sincerity, and deep belief in religious principles of the young Defenders of the Shrine as an incredible and unparalleled phenomenon that has shown the fallacy of Western-oriented analyses.
What was the significance of the Defenders of the Shrine movement according to Imam Khamenei?

The Defenders of the Shrine movement was significant because it neutralized the plot of the Arrogant Powers and the threat posed by Daesh and groups aligned with it, showcasing the global outlook of the Islamic Revolution and its ability to recreate its inherent fervor and enthusiasm.
How did the Defenders of the Shrine neutralize the plot of the Arrogant Powers?
The Defenders of the Shrine neutralized the plot of the Arrogant Powers by their presence in countries where the enemy had devised a highly dangerous plot, with the Islamic Republic at its core.
What was the nature of Daesh and groups aligned with it according to Imam Khamenei?

What was the role of the Defenders of the Shrine in saving the region?
